Name: Rocket Cat
Description: A flying cat with the aid of a jar rocket. Can rain down powerful explosives but completely helpless against air enemies.

Name: Shielded Crossbowcat
Description: A cat armed with a light crossbow and a tower shield. Can delivery high damage bolts but at shorter range than bows and slings.

Name: Flying Monk
Description: A monk equipped with artificial wings. No one really know how it work but one thing is certain, these monks will smack anyone down with impunity.

Name: King
Description: The king of the Central Kingdom. Too kingly to fight in battles and prefer to observe the worldly state of affair from afar.

Name: Adaqua
Description: Leader of the Red Leaf Bandit but later became friend with the Rabbit Forest Alliance. Quite skilled with bow. Unable to perform melee attacks.

Name: Bigta and Sertors
Description: A bizarre cavalry pair of rabbit and dog. Champion and leader of the Wee Alliance. Deliver strong charge with a lance and bolster many support skills.

Name: Duskuksa
Description: A dwarf of tradition and faith. This Rune Journeyman intended to carry his forebears' legacy to the utmost. He can use rune smithing to provide buffs to allies and unleash powerful explosion on enemies.

Name: Iri
Description: No one really understands why this hearty halfling travelled so far to this land, but it seems to be that only our King knows the answer. Her skill in trap and gadget engineering is closer to none, gathered during her vast journey, no doubt.

Name: Nayedien
Description: An elf of peerless beauty and ambiguity. No one knows where this elf is from or any past-of-self. For reasons unknown, the King saw fit to assign this person of unknown origin a hero of Royal Ordains and close aide. Court rumour that the King was charmed by such beauty, their dubious relationship, and the implication of elvish intervention aside, no one can verily deny the mastery in martial prowess of this elven warrior.

Name: Nraesier
Description: Older sister of Vagrant Marauder. Talker and thinker of the pair. Unmatched in scouting skills, and packed many throwing knives to dispatch enemies from a distance.

Name: Orsanoas
Description: A great carnyx warrior from the Hlilitan Highland Alliance who will stop at nothing to become stronger. The song he plays can instil fear in enemies and courage in allies.

Name: Rodhinbar
Description: A chief of a distant land with unmatched skill in archery. He seemed to arrive with a heavy conflict in his heart after receiving the invitation from the king to join the Royal Ordains. Many in the court speculated that he came to spy on our Kingdom and may jeopardise our land's safety. Such worry did not seem to cloud over our King's mind in the least however.

Name: Tulia
Description: Ranger captain of the Northern Verts. Have a long, bitter history with the Red Leaf Bandits. Skilled in both melee and ranged combat.

Name: Vraesier
Description: This bandit has one thing really going, and that is her skill in battle. Her rough manner and appearance did not help to avoid being held in contempt by most in the civilised world. Still, this so-called "knave" can easily take down even the most skilled knight with ease.

Name: Vurus
Description: Accomplished commander and strategist of the Central Kingdom. Absolutely brilliant in warfare. Defeat is rarely possible with him as the commander. Can provide support to his troops with numerous buffs but is rather unkeen in direct combat.

Name: Bear Cub
Description: A small bear cub that seems to roll around like it owns the place. Cute but extremely dangerous. Do not attack under any circumstance.

Name: Bunny
Description: A tiny bunny. Will meep at anyone nearby and distract them.

Name: Cloud Dog
Description: A dog that float around enjoying life. No one is certain if it bite.

Name: Fluffy Bird
Description: A very nice looking white fluffy bird. Like to jump around and look cute.

Name: Snake
Description: A snake. This animal will certainly bite and inflict poison to anyone dare crossing its path.

Name: Eagle
Description: An eagle eager for prays. Fast and cheap air fighter with great versatility.

Name: Rabbit Revenge
Description: A cheap small cannon for many purposes. Rabbitmen can be innovative with good guidance.

Name: Rabbit Role
Description: A rabbit in a hole waiting to stab a passerby in the rear.

Name: Rabbit Rarren Ratcher
Description: A warren guard. No home means no purpose.

Name: Rabbit Ruddy
Description: A rabbit hound cavalry. Light enough to quickly run through the enemy line.

Name: Rabbit Roney
Description: A rabbit of death. Fast and deadly. Can jump into the enemy group and quickly wreck havoc.

Name: Rabbit Rannermate
Description: A rabbit banner bearer. Bringer of field menaces. Can raise banner to buff nearby friends but cannot attack anyone.

Name: Rabbit Rero
Description: A rabbit hero. As good as a rabbit can be. Very fast and can debuff nearby enemies.

Name: Rabbit Rnight
Description: A rabbit knight. Not so bad as a frontline leader but expect no grand performance. Somewhat strong in defence but very slow.

Name: Rabbit Rooligan
Description: A footsoldier rabbit slinger. Decent skirmisher in its own right and can dig the ground to lay trap against approaching enemies.

Name: Rabbit Rhell Rompanion
Description: A rabbit snail cavalry. Slow but tough.

Name: Rabbit Raider
Description: A footsoldier rabbit spearman. Weak but strong in number. Can inflict slow and charge enemies.

Name: Rabbit Rower
Description: A small stone tower with a lone stone thrower rabbit. Solid but not by much. When earth fail, stone will prevail.

Name: Rabbit Roulder
Description: A flimsy cheap trebuchet good for small siege. Very slow but deal good damage to buildings.

Name: Toxic Mollusk
Description: A bitter old snail that retains only disdain for other creatures after living for so long. Will throw his toxic beard at anyone he deems annoying.

Name: Snail Defender
Description: A young snail armed with a sword and shield. An eternal enemy to all knights.
